pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Surge XT is a free and open-source hybrid synthesizer, originally written by Claes Johanson. It is a versatile and powerful instrument for music production, featuring three oscillator sections, an extremely flexible modulation engine, a state-of-the-art stereo effect engine, and much more.
Surge XT includes a large library of factory presets, wavetables, effects, and modulation presets. It supports modern plugin formats and can be used as a standalone application or as a plugin in your favorite DAW.

use.flag: Install CLAP (CLever Audio Plugin) format plugins
Install VST3 (Virtual Studio Technology 3) format plugins
Build standalone applications with JACK support. Also enables optional JUCE dependencies (libcurl, webkit-gtk, gtk+) which silence build warnings but are not required for Surge XT functionality
